title: Uncle Si's Guide to Shutting Down a Bully
description:
Si has STRONG feelings about how to handle a bully. The boys finally try Little Debbie Christmas Tree Cakes Ice Cream, and John-David won't let a broken spoon interrupt his review. Martin reveals his New Year's resolution. Si admits what happened when he held Sadie's baby. Si and John-David have very personal advice for a fan whose baby is expected prematurely. And Godwin shares his difficult adoption experience.
